annotations: I would be very capable Administrative Assistant skilled at multi-tasking. Bringing several years of experience in business operations. I am very personable and am able to communicate fluently.
Over saw all business operations. Hiring, Firing, Payroll, Advertising, Managing Liquor License, ordering products and food for day-to-day operations.
All Office duties, Accounts Payable, audits for WC and other insurances
Northwood Tennis & Racquet Facility – Fitness Instructor
Daily classes for Boot camp and spin instructor
Laurel Manor Nursing Home – Human Resources/ Accounts Payable

Maintained all Personnel records and orientations for newly hired staff. Processed for a biweekly PR. Handled and reviewed benefit packages as well as health coverage options. Assisted with employee disciplinary actions. Accounts Payable – paid nursing home bills and reported to Board of Directors with basic financials.
East Stroudsburg University - Accounting & human resource courses to maintain my position
